form.name: diarrheoa_two
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: PNC Diarrhoea> Diarrheoa Two

field.name: Does the baby have any of following symptoms?
Diarrhoea with Severe Dehydration
field.options: Movement only when stimulated or no movement | Sunken eyes | Skin pinch goes back very slowly |Click here to take action

field.name: Diarrhoea with Some Dehydration
field.options: Restless and irritable | Sunken eyes |Skin pinch goes back slowly | Click here to take action

field.name: Diarrhoea with No Dehydration
field.options: Not enough signs to classify as some or severe dehydration | Click here to take action

field.name: Severe persistent diarrhoea
field.options: Diarrhoea lasting ≥ 14 days |Click here to take action
